LIFO_Int

This component acts as a LIFO (Last-In First-Out) buffer for integer data. When the input event [In]push fires, the input data [In]data is pushed on to the top of the stack and the output event [Out]push is triggered. When the input event [In]pop fires, the data on the top of the stack is popped off the stack and presented to the output [Out]data and the output event [Out]pop is triggered. Thus the last data item to be pushed on to the stack is the first data item to be popped off the stack to the output. The maximum number of data items that can be held on the stack, is determined by the maximum buffer length parameter.

If the number of data items on the stack is equal to the maximum buffer length, then the input event [In]push will trigger the corresponding output event [Out]err. This pattern is repeated if the input event [In]pop is triggered and there are no data items on the stack.

Note that the output data [Out]data is persistent.

Ports

  • [In] data:

    Data input, data item to be pushed on to the stack.

  • [Out] data:

    Data output, data item to be popped off the stack.

  • [In] push:

    Input event.

  • [Out] push:

    Output event, triggered when the input event [In]push fires and data is successfully pushed on the stack.

  • [Out] err:

    Output event, triggered when there is an error when the input event [In]push fires.

  • [In] pop:

    Input event.

  • [Out] pop:

    Output event, triggered when the input event [In]pop fires and data is successfully popped off the stack.

  • [Out] err:

    Output event, triggered when there is an error when the input event [In]pop fires.

  • [In] flush:

    Input event, empties the buffer and triggers the output event [Out]flush.

  • [Out] flush:

    Output event.

Parameters

  • Max. length:

    maximum buffer length

    Data Type:

    I,

    Min Value:

    0,

    Max Value:

    1000000,

    Default Value:

    5

State Machine

Stateless.

Profiles

All.

Toolbox

Core.

Version

v2.1.

Native Dependencies

  • TDK1.1:

Licence Type

LGPL.

Component Supplier

inx ltd.
